meanings.definition: To discover or identify the presence or existence of something.
meanings.sent1: The scientist detects a new species of insect in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The security system detects any movement in the area.
meanings.sent3: The detective detects a clue that leads to solving the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her keen eye detects even the slightest change in the environment.
meanings.sent5: The radar system detects incoming aircraft with precision.

meanings.sent1: The dog detects the scent of food from afar.
meanings.sent2: She detects a hint of sadness in his voice.
meanings.sent3: The robot detects an obstacle in its path and changes direction.
meanings.sent4: His intuition detects the underlying truth in the situation.
meanings.sent5: The baby detects the sound of her mother's voice and smiles.
